name: Blossom (Enya Games)
description:
There is but a minute left before eternal darkness takes the land. You must defend the tree of life to restore the light of the world for another thousand years.

This game is a submission for the Blackthornprod game jam !

Theme : Less is more 

Our game fits the theme because you have but a minute to save the land from eternal darkness :()

Hope you guys ENJOY!!!

Controls :
